About the Company: Emgee Cables & Communications Ltd is engaged in the manufacture of three types of cables -- Electric Cables, Communication Cables and Cable Testing Lab.The company`s product range includes Electric Cables i.e. House Wire,Submersible Flat Cables,Winding Wire, Communication Cables: like Coaxial,CCTV,Tele Cable,Optical Fibre,Cable Testing Lab.Transmitters and Receivers:i.e.Optical Transmitters,Nodes of Accessories,Media Converter & Switches, Security Systems, Mobile Phone accessories:like batteries, Models,Battery Testing Lab ,Chargers i.e.Models and Charger Testing Lab.
